name: World Racing 2
description:
Italy, Egypt and Hawaii already make your heart beat faster? Then what do over 100 challenging race tracks and more than 40 cars from 16 manufacturers sound like? Sounds like fun, we agree.

And fun is also what World Racing 2 is all about. With five game modes to choose from, from arcade to simulation, World Racing 2 has everything a racer's heart desires. The visual and logical damage model also boosts the realism and adds another gear to the fun of the game!

FEATURES:

- Lead foot: Various game modes such as Arcade, Simulation, Mission Mode, Training and multiplayer racing provide full throttle atmosphere
- Worldwide: More than 100 race tracks await you, which can also be used off-road
- Enormous: More than 40 different vehicles from 16 manufacturers leave nothing to be desired
- Innovative: The realistic damage model comes up with dirt, scratches and dents and influences the driving behaviour accordingly
- Attention: New side and oncoming traffic can quickly thwart your victory
- As desired: Sophisticated tuning is just as possible as the individual adjustment of colours, tyres, body vinyl etc.
